name: Chooser3D
body:
### Welcome to the THREE.Chooser3D plugin GitHub Page. ![chooser 3d img](http://i65.tinypic.com/2u7nhns.png) ### Demo [HTML Demo page](http://toocat.info/projects/chooser3d/demo/htmlDemo.html)
[Three.js Demo page](http://toocat.info/projects/chooser3d/demo/threejsDemo.html) ### Device support Requires WebGL ready device, falls back to software renderer (currently without antialiasing). ### Ease of use `var chooser3D = new THREE.Chooser3D('chooser3DCanvas')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/badoo.png')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/flickr.png')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/plurk.png')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/rss.png')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/skype.png')`
        `.addIconObject('images/social/forrst.png')`
        `.setEventHandler(function (object) {`
                `console.log(object.getIdent());`
        `})`
        `.paint();`
### API `.slow() || .normal() || .fast() || .veryFast()` - determine the slide speed `.setLight(color, intensity)` - sets the directional light `.setArrowColor(color)` - set the color of the arrows `.setLeftSelector() && setRightSelector()` - replace default arrows `.softwareRendering()` - forces usage of the software renderer `.addIconObject(imgUrl, ident, width, height)` - adds an icon `.addJSONObject(jsonModelUrl, ident, scale, rotation)` - adds a JSON model `.setEventHandler(function(object){})` - set the event handler, object is the newly focused object ### Authors and Contributors @ecivic
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
